errors.error_description: Specifies outdated Python 2.7 version requirement when NetBox requires Python 3.8+
correction_candidates: To install NetBox, you need Python 3.8 or later along with the following system packages: postgresql-dev, libxml2-dev, libxslt1-dev, and zlib1g-dev.
To install NetBox, you need Python 3.6 or later along with the following system packages: postgresql-dev, libxml2-dev, libxslt1-dev, and zlib1g-dev.
To install NetBox, you need Python 3.10 or later along with the following system packages: postgresql-dev, libxml2-dev, libxslt1-dev, and zlib1g-dev.
To install NetBox, you need Python 3.7 or later along with the following system packages: postgresql-dev, libxml2-dev, libxslt1-dev, and zlib1g-dev.
errors.golden_answer: To install NetBox, you need Python 3.8 or later along with the following system packages: postgresql-dev, libxml2-dev, libxslt1-dev, and zlib1g-dev.
